macklemore is still dope, just not a favorite, pretty hit or miss.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5498c2776368721acbc80300#post_5498c2776368721acbc80300
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5498c2876368721a27ff0300#post_5498c2876368721a27ff0300
Let me set the scene. Imagine Squiggy in the shower. Doing all the usual shower stuff. Washing my hair, lathering my masculine body with soap, and humming the tune to Wildfire. And then I hear a strange _tak tak_ on the shower floor. The ball on my captive bead ring fell out. So I immediately drop everything I'm doing and stop it with my foot. It was a good 4 inches from the drain before I stopped it and picked it up.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
